Type Definitions

ErrorObject

Source:
  • typedefs.js, line 1
Properties:
Name Type Description
message string Error Message
code string Error Code
display string Formated Version of Message and Code used when logging or displaying the error.
raw Object Full Error Object Returned
Object Returned for ANY Disnode Error. Standardized to make error handling universial across discord. The raw error object is always returned however incase you need all of the information.
Type:
  • Object

ChannelObject

Source:
  • typedefs.js, line 16
Properties:
Name Type Description
id snowflake the id of this channel (will be equal to the guild if it's the "general" channel)
guild_id guild_id the id of the guild
type string "text" or "voice"
position integer sorting position of the channel
is_private bool should always be false for guild channels
permission_overwrites array an array of overwrite objects
topic string 0-1024 character channel topic
last_message_id snowflake the id of the last message sent in this channel
bitrate integer the bitrate (in bits) of the voice channel
bitrate integer the user limit of the voice channel
Object used to describe a channel
Type:
  • Object

ChannelSettings

Source:
  • typedefs.js, line 31
Properties:
Name Type Description
name string 2-100 character channel name
position int the position of the channel in the left-hand listing
topic string 0-1024 character channel topic
bitrate int the bitrate (in bits) of the voice channel; 8000 to 96000 (128000 for VIP servers)
user_limit int the user limit of the voice channel; 0 refers to no limit, 1 to 99 refers to a user limit
Object used to update a channel
Type:
  • Object

GetMessageSettings

Source:
  • typedefs.js, line 41
Properties:
Name Type Description
around snowflake get messages around this message ID
before snowflake get messages before this message ID
after snowflake get messages after this message ID
limit integer max number of messages to return (1-100)
Object used to when retriving channel messages
Type:
  • Object

CreateInviteSettings

Source:
  • typedefs.js, line 50
Properties:
Name Type Description
max_age integer duration of invite in seconds before expiry, or 0 for never
max_uses integer max number of uses or 0 for unlimited
temporary bool whether this invite only grants temporary membership
unique bool if true, don't try to reuse a similar invite (useful for creating many unique one time use invites)
Object used to when creating Invite
Type:
  • Object

MessageDeleteObject

Source:
  • typedefs.js, line 69
Properties:
Name Type Description
channel string Channel the message was deleted in
server string Server the message was deleted in

The complete Triforce, or one or more components of the Triforce.

Properties:
Name Type Description
id string Message ID

userID string Sender's ID
channel string Channel the message was deleted in

The complete Triforce, or one or more components of the Triforce.
